phase.title: Early Bird Special
phase.description: Be among the first to experience next-gen crypto security at a fraction of the retail cost.

phase.title: Pre-Release
phase.description: Save off the full price when you pre-order and lock in this limited-time price!

phase.title: Official Launch
phase.description: Last chance to get a Vultiphone. Don’t wait—secure yours now!

limited_offer.title: Limited Offer
limited_offer.description: First 100 Preorders Come with a @THORGuards NFT
limited_offer.btn_order: Get it now for only CHF 99

comes_with_vultisig.title: Comes with the Vultisig App
comes_with_vultisig.description: VultiPhone is designed with crypto security in mind, pre-installed with Vultisig—a self-custodial multi-chain crypto vault. Protect your digital assets with unmatched ease and start earning crypto rewards from day one.

device_promo.title: Your co-signing companion you don't want to miss.

session_app.title: Vultiphone also comes with
session_app.description: Session is an end-to-end encrypted messenger that minimises sensitive metadata, designed and built for people who want absolute privacy and freedom from any form of surveillance.

items.title: Delivery Details
items.description: The estimated delivery is expected by Q4 24/Q1 25, subject to international shipping times based on your location.

items.title: Data Privacy
items.description: Your personal information (address, email, transaction ID) will be used solely for communication regarding delivery and will be deleted once your Vultiphone has been delivered.

items.title: Warranty Information
items.description: Your personal information (address, email, transaction ID) will be used solely for communication regarding delivery and will be deleted once your Vultiphone has been delivered.

stay_tuned.title: Stay Tuned
stay_tuned.description: Be the first to hear about launch dates, new features, and exclusive offers. Enter your email to stay connected.
